description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nHeart Versus Mind:
After your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} buffs are damaged and destroyed, they gain 50% of the original strength of the {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} as Maximum {STAT_health}. This trait does not stack.
